Participants shall provide an affidavit signed by the participant or personssisting the Family attesting to recurring gifts or assistance received.
Examples of regular contributions include:
Regular payment of a Family’s bills (such as utilities, telephone, rent,redit cards, and car payments);
Cash or other liquid assets provided to any Family member on a regular basis;nd
“In-kind” contributions such as groceries and clothing provided to a Familyn a regular basis;

Non-monetary contributions shall be valued at the cost of purchasing thetems, as determined by DCHA. For contributions that may vary from month toonth (such as, utility payments), DCHA shall include an average amount basedpon past history;
